item.title: About
item.description: My path to Software Engineering It was March 2020. I was enjoying my growing career as a professional musician, choir conductor. Suddenly all my rehearsals were cancelled and all my concerts “rescheduled”. “Two or three month and I will be back to my music” I told myself. At that time I could not suspect that a new career was waiting for me. March 2020, could not work and a lot of “free”.
